file_content.text: With the Coronas gone, our civies are safe and sound and back to supporting the rebellion.
Those gangsters won't be giving you any more trouble.
You saved a lot of lives today. Who knows if the rebellion would've survived with the Coronas leeching off support?
You can get back to taking care of your citizens.
Be glad we'll never know.
With pleasure. Be safe out there. And thank you.
When one enemy falls, another soon rises. Stay vigilant.
Don't get too comfortable.
That's the truth--I will. Be safe out there, and thank you.
I'm very good at my work.
Ha! I love it. Safe travels to you. And really... thank you.
Make sure you take out every Corona thug and all their defenses. We don't want 'em reconstituting.
Blast it... What about old Ben Kahob?
They cut him to pieces, left him on the counter in his tapcafe. You, uh... want me to notify his wife?
I should be the one. Just process the scene. Danod out.
Welcome to Blue Sector, Master Jedi--gangland central.
Welcome to Blue Sector, Major--gangland central.
Welcome to Blue Sector--gangland central.
For the thugs around here war's good for business, and I've got terrified citizens to prove it.
You don't appear surprised by this killing.
This murder isn't unusual?
I presume killings like this are common in your district.
This murder isn't unusual?
Civilian attacks don't faze you.
This murder isn't unusual?
The old man getting killed--you don't look surprised.
This murder isn't unusual?
Not these days. Blue Sector's always had gang trouble, but lately the dominant set--the Coronas--they crossed a line.
These thugs--who are they?
Tell me about the gangs.
Blue Sector's a tough zone--plenty of gangs, plenty of trouble. But the Coronas are the big dogs, and lately they crossed a line.
Bad stuff happens.
Maybe, but it shouldn't be like this. Blue Sector's always had gang trouble, but lately the dominant set--the Coronas--they crossed a line.
Their thing used to be hijacking supply runs and armed robbery--the usual stuff.
Now they're shaking down folks just trying to help the rebellion.
Ben Kahob's stockpiling medkits for Republic troops? Great! Cut him down and take the kits. It's enough to make you sick.
If they're trying to undercut civilian support for the rebellion, they could be working for the Empire.
It may be an Imperial plot.
Or maybe they just got greedy. If we don't stop 'em, two things'll happen...
I understand. I won't stand by and let this brutality go on.
Leave the Coronas to me.
I knew I liked you. Their hideout isn't far, but they've got assault cannons and shields.
And you're telling me... why?
Help me stop them. Look, maybe they got greedy, or maybe they got in bed with the Empire. Either way, two things'll happen...
Innocent people are gonna keep dying, and support for the rebellion's gonna suffer.
Look, I know it's not your job, but the Corona hideout's got assault cannons, shields--my boys'd be slaughtered. We need military help.
I'll go. This brutality must be stopped.
We must protect the innocent.
These gangsters must not be allowed to prey on your citizens.
We must protect the innocent.
I'll have that filth neutralized in no time.
We must protect the innocent.
These guys are done for. Count on it.
We must protect the innocent.
I can't tell you how glad I am to hear that.
We need to stop them before they do permanent damage to the rebellion.
They're a threat to the war.
Good.
Just be careful. They've got defenses in place you'll have to take out--and they're as mean as any Sith.
Not a chance. [Refuse quest]
I understand. Just--people are dying. Let me know if you change your mind.
Sorry, I just got a call about a homicide. I'm waiting on a sitrep.
